## Matrix.Transpose() method

Compute the transpose of a given matrix

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static Transpose(matrix: Matrix): Matrix;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  matrix | <code>Matrix</code> | defines the matrix to transpose |

<b>Returns:</b>
